resources.string:
-	Press the "search" icon to search after rooms on campus (eg. "KERR1110"). To instantly select a room, press any suggestion from the dropdown list. To view a list of results, hit the enter key.

 - Press the "eye" icon to zoom to a view showing both you and your target room in the same frame.

 - Press the "directions" icon followed by either "walking" or "driving" from the drop down list to see a visual path from your location to the target room. Repeat the choice to hide the path.

 - Press the "star" icon to see options for managing favorites. 

 - Select "Add room to favorites" to add the currently targeted room to your list of favorite rooms.

 - Select "Show/hide favorites" to toggle a visual representation of your favorite rooms.

 - Select "Edit favorites" to enter edit mode, where rooms can be deleted from the favorite list. To delete a room, tap the room marker and then hit the "trash can" icon.

 - To leave editing mode, press the "back" arrow in the top left corner.
